imdb.plot outline: Nu Scape delivers a relaxing and peaceful spa-like atmosphere to anywhere that can stream video. This is the first TV show meant for when you are not watching TV. We turn your screen into a digital window with an amazing view. Welcome ambient video into your space to promote relaxation and mindfulness. Give your room a view, give it Nu Scape.
imdb.title: Nu Scape
plot: _Nu Scape_ (qv) delivers a relaxing and peaceful spa-like atmosphere to anywhere that can stream video. This is the first TV show meant for when you are not watching TV. We turn your screen into a digital window with an amazing view. Welcome ambient video into your space to promote relaxation and mindfulness. Give your room a view, give it _Nu Scape_ (qv).::Joseph Daniels
